turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to get a Starbucks espresso beverage from the one on Archer Road, Gainesville, Florida. But, actually I would like to add a one Venti decaf coffee as well. And I want the espresso to be with milk and with honey as well as whipped cream. And.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And both of them sized venti, and with milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for both the espresso and the decaf coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and for the espresso you wanted the quad size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it comes in solo, doppio, triple, or quad.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Quad, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, one moment while i order that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti decaf coffee with whole milk, a quad espresso with whole milk, honey, and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on archer road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drinks will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
